website_summaries.verdict: The projector-packing Lenovo Yoga Tablet 2 Pro excels as a self-contained home theater, but questionable Android software tweaks and performance issues hamper the experience.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Poor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the large screen, but there is nothing else to recommend it. Painfully slow and the power system is laughable. Overnight charge from 16% might get you to 58, but no more. If you use it while on charge there will be a slow but inexorable discharge. Definitely not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie53

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet. Projection is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. Projection is awesome. Can get 70" legible picture in very dark room. Sound quality is great and loud enough to enjoy a movie. Battery life is very good: from a full charge i can project 1 full movie at 1.5 hours and still be left with over 30%.
customer_reviews.author: 3volution

customer_reviews.title: Lovely usable tablet, no keyboard case.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and I love it. The projector is great and screen size makes it usable as a laptop with Bluetooth keyboard. And it updated straightaway to android 5 without any problems. Item description is wrong however. There is no keyboard cover in the box. I contacted Amazon support and they refunded £20 so I could get one separately. Once again Amazon customer support has come up trumps, that's why I bought through them. Well done Amazon, but please correct the details!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Find I don't need to install many of the apps I use on my phone (Gmail, Facebook etc) as the screen is large enough to just use the browser! Battery lasts ages and I love the projector. It doesn't need to be on the latest version of Android to work!

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The projector is a superb feature, yes it's brightness is limited but it's enhanced my entertainment with family and friends! Shame it doesn't rotate. The battery is better than expected but it takes a long time to charge. The stand is superb you can hang/angle it anywhere. The software is a joke you basically have to navigate away from anything to do with Lenovo. Screen is good. It barely works with sky go but other tv providers works well. Difficult to get a decent cover. Overall I like it huge screen, great projector, quick proccesor. I would recommend it as a second tablet but complements not replaces my iPad.

customer_reviews.title: utterly pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommended this unit more highly. I have had 6 or so tablet devices before including iPads and generic android tablets. The advantages of this unit are: Speed of the CPU Great screen Slick interface Very flexible stand unit enabling you to position for most uses without resorting to propping it up with books or similar HD screen Good sound volume which has always been a disappointment on my previous devices Storage expandability really takes this to another level if usefulness BATTERY LIFE ... I shout this because the battery life is epic making this the single best tablet I have seen or owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tezzer

customer_reviews.title: Overall an excellent machine. Graphics are superb
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent machine. Graphics are superb, sound great. Watching videos is a real pleasure. Weight, portability and stand all very good. My main criticism is the battery life...it isn't anywhere near 15hrs...sorry, no matter what I do (including switch off GPS & Bluetooth), can I get it near that time !!! Given this is a major selling point and a key reason for buying it...I am TRULY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BrianJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect specs and of course the stunning projector adds a ...
customer_reviews.text: Waited some days before I gave this review, just to be sure. The overall conclusion is a 5star rating. Elegant, with proper sound, display, usability and general functionality. My only concern was about the weight, and it shocked me with how light this feels. Perfect specs and of course the stunning projector adds a huge plus. Highly recommented ! Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Screen is lovely and the tablet is well designed and built with quality. The sound is good but the JBL ear buds are excellent. SD cards have to be formatted as FAT32, as others won't be recognised, as I found out. On screen keyboard isn't bad but is enormous and keys are much larger than standard . Cannot comment on the fifteen hour battery claim as yet but it ran all day even including a movie. Even my son who has an iPad was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kirby

customer_reviews.title: To like or Not to like...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I like it or not? Dilemma. Some days, some times it seems fantastic. Other times it just 'feels' totally dreadful. My iPads are always excellent - You decide? I would not buy this again, nor recommend it. But I can't say why...
